<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<body bgcolor="#ffffff" leftmargin="0" topmargin="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" onContextmenu="return false">

	</tr>
</table>

	</tr>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>

<head>
<title>강의시간표 조회</title>
<meta http-equiv="imagetoolbar" content="no">
<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache"> 
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0"> 
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache"> 

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<head>
<title>강의시간표 조회</title>

<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache"> 
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0"> 
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache"> 

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<head>
<title>강의시간표 조회</title>
<meta http-equiv="imagetoolbar" content="no">
<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache"> 
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0"> 
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache"> 

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

	<tr> 
		<td style="PADDING-RIGHT: 10px; PADDING-LEFT: 10px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 10px; PADDING-TOP: 10px" bgcolor="#F9F9F9">

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<head>
<title>강의시간표 조회</title>

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>

</table>
</center>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<html>
<head>
<title>강의시간표 조회</title>
<meta http-equiv="imagetoolbar" content="no">
<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache"> 
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0"> 
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache"> 

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache"> 
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0"> 
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache"> 

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<body bgcolor="#ffffff" leftmargin="0" topmargin="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" onContextmenu="return false">

	<tr>

<head>
<title>강의시간표 조회</title>
<meta http-equiv="imagetoolbar" content="no">
<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache"> 
<meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0"> 
<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache"> 

<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/src08/jsp/profGrade/css/haksa.css">



<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

			<td class="table_green">1</td>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>

<script language="javascript" src="/src08/js/common.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
		function popupWindow(){
			var printwin=window.open('/jsp/HUFS/stu1/english_help.html','','toolbar=no,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=600');

		}


		function lecture_open(ag_1,ag_2,ag_3,ag_4){
	/*		var printwin=window.open("/jsp/HUFS/stu1/stu1_c0_a0_d3.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=750,height=700');*/
			var printwin=window.open("/src08/jsp/lecture/syllabus.jsp?mode=print&ledg_year="+ag_1+"&ledg_sessn="+ag_2+"&org_sect="+ag_3+"&lssn_cd="+ag_4,
							'print','toolbar=yes,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=950,height=850');
		}


		function doSearch() {
			document.form1.action = '/src08/jsp/lecture/LECTURE2020L.jsp';
			document.form1.submit();
		}


		function org_change() {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			premier1.style.visibility = "hidden";

			doSearch();
		}


		function time_submit() {
			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";
			
			doSearch();
		}


		function gubun_change(ag_gubun) {
			if ( document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd ) document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.value = "!_!";
			if ( document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd ) document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.value = "!_!";

			if ( ag_gubun == "1" ) {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
			} else {
				document.form1.ag_crs_strct_cd.style.visibility = "hidden";
				document.form1.ag_compt_fld_cd.style.visibility = "visible";
			}

			premier1.style.visibility = "visible";

			doSearch();
		}

</script>
</head>
